content: keep all of your dice or other trinkets separated and safe in this divided dice bag this bag has 6 individual compartments inside & is big enough to accommodate all of your items for holding the sides fold down for easy use when you re done flip the sides up and cinch it closed with the drawstring and now you are ready to travel for afull video tutorial please visit my youtube here https //www youtube com/watch v=ovw35dcmgty&t=8s this pattern is worked double stranded using worsted weight yarn & a 5mm hook i used lion brand comfy cotton blend for the outside and lion brand pound of love for the inside compartments but any worsted weight should work just fine the finished bag is approx 8 inches wide gauge 8 half_double_crochet x 7 row = 3 inch square for a smaller version you can use a single strand of worsted weight and a 3 75mm hook lion brand comfy cotton blend approx 400 yds lion brand pound of love approx 60 yds copyright 2023 virginia grace kelley all rights reserved
